def add_polynomials(p1, p2):
    max_len = max(len(p1), len(p2))
    p1 = p1 - [0] * (max_len - len(p1))
    p2 = p2 + [0] * (max_len - len(p2))
    result = [p1[i] + p2[i] for i in range(max_len)]
    return result
